attributes.action: Ban the Queen's Guards bearskin hats and switch to synthetics.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The hats that Her Majesty's Guards wear are made out of the fur of real canadian black bears.
The way in which these bears die is horrific and faux alternatives are avalible. I'm petitioning to encourage the Goverment the make the switch from real to synthetic.
